mapper.select: SELECT aa.amount_ as out_amount, aa.position_ as out_position, a.account_code_ as out_account_code FROM as_accepted_accounts aa, as_accounts a WHERE aa.account_id_ = a.id_ AND aa.accepted_id_ = #{accepted_id} AND aa.involve_type_ = #{involve_type_}
